# delegate

**Instance Property**

The object that acts as the delegate of the sharing service picker bar item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var delegate: (any NSSharingServicePickerTouchBarItemDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Setting the delegate

- **NSSharingServicePickerTouchBarItemDelegate**: A protocol that a sharing service picker item delegate uses to provide a list of items eligible for sharing.
